title: Buying Skins For 50% Off
body:
I want to eventually own most or all skins. Is purchasing all skins that are 50% off the cheapest way to do so? Any drawbacks / benefits of purchasing the 50% off skins? Is it a weekly deal? Does it change often? Will eventually all skins be made available?

Thanks!

replies.body: If you have a job then all ears buy all the stuff on sale , if not your more than likely gonna have to rely on mystery gifts , Hextech are actually not beneficial as much cause 9/10 you will get a champion shard regardless. Mystery Gifts Skins well that would be my 2nd option if you want them keep and you get a good chance of getting something rare or something good. But Option 1 buy on 50% sales would be my way to go
are purchasing all skins via mystery skins cheaper than the 50% off sale? Do you know what it'd cost to buy all skins (and thus calculate what 50% off would be worth)?
